title: Sold Seraph's embrace for 0 gold.
body: Tried to sell {{item:3040}} as Lulu support, but it only sold for 0 gold. I was unable to buy a better item.

replies.body:
That is normal, it has no sell price.

A better question is why did you build it on lulu?

We were really far ahead: open inhibitors, drakes, barons. We had it all, and our ADC was good. I got the added AP and mana to buff her speed up, shield, and ult +10%CD. It wasn't effective in helping everyone else stay alive, it wasn't helping us take objectives. Probably the first and likely last time I build it. 

You still pay to build the item, it shouldn't have 0 sell price while its predecessor does.
